person_search.heading: Who is being moved?
person_search.unknown_number:
Book a secure move uses the PNC number to ensure moves are linked to the correct person.

If you don’t have this number you can move a person without a PNC number.
person_search.unknown_number_prison:
Book a secure move uses the prison number to ensures moves are linked to the correct person.

Ensure the person you are looking for is in NOMIS.

person_search_results.heading: Who is being moved?
person_search_results.cant_find_person: I can’t find the person I’m looking for
person_search_results.ensure_person_exists: Ensure the person you are looking for is in NOMIS.

move_details.heading: Where is this person moving?
move_details.update_link: where this person is moving to

hearing_details.heading: Is this move associated with a court case?

timetable.heading: This court date may already exist in NOMIS

court_information.heading: Is there information for the court?

risk_information.heading: Are there risks with moving this person?

health_information.heading: Does this person’s health affect transport?

document.heading: Are there any documents to upload?

court_hearings.heading: Court hearing
court_hearings.nomis_failed: A court date for this hearing could not be added to NOMIS — check it was added manually
court_hearings.nomis_failed_with_index: A court date for hearing {{index}} could not be added to NOMIS — check it was added manually

cancel.warning: You must also contact the supplier to cancel the move request for {{name}}

confirmation.detail: The move for {{name}} to {{location}} on {{date}} has been requested with {{supplier}}.
confirmation.detail_proposed: The move for {{name}} to {{location}} has been sent to the Population Management Unit (PMU) for review.
confirmation.saved_to_nomis:
A court date for case number {{cases}} on {{date}} has been added to NOMIS.

If this person has more than one hearing you will need to add any extra court dates.
confirmation.saved_to_nomis_plural: Court dates for case numbers {{cases}} on {{date}} have been added to NOMIS.
confirmation.saved_to_nomis_failed: You need to add this court date to NOMIS as it could not be added.
confirmation.saved_to_nomis_failed_plural: You need to add court dates to NOMIS for {{cases}} as they could not be added.

agreement_status.heading: Has this move been agreed with receiving prison?
